title: Chaos In The Second Layer
body:
Chaos In The Second Layer

In one of the areas of the second layer, a giant bird nearly one hundred meters long was sleeping soundly. The bird was black in colour, and a long tail that was engulfed in deep brown flames protruded from its back.

Thousands of kilometres of area around the bird was burning in black fire, releasing intense heat that could instantly turn any mid-level Rank Two or below core evolver into ashes.

Suddenly, the gloomy area covered in the black fire was illuminated by rainbow-coloured light, alerting the sleeping bird.

The bird slowly opened its deep yellow eyes and saw the sky flashing with rainbow light. Upon seeing the rainbow-coloured sky, the bird immediately stood up and screeched loudly. It flapped its wings and flew towards the source of the rainbow light.

Rumble!
